Description: Black steatite cippus; Harpocrates holds snakes, scorpions and lions by the tails; head of Bes at the top; Hieroglyphic text on the face, around the edge and on the back in fifteen rows.
Curator's comments: H. Sternberg-El Hotabi, Untersuchungen zur Ubelieferungsgeschichte der Horusstelen, Teil II, Wiesbaden 1999, ÄA 62, S. 55, Taf. XX
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2006-present, Glasgow, Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum, LT Loan Ancient Egypt British Museum Partnership Gallery
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
